titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MRI ULTRASOUND FUSION GUIDED BIOPSY INDICATOR - Description

div.p: MRI ULTRASOUND FUSION GUIDED BIOPSY INDICATOR is the same as attribute PATIENT PROCEDURE PERFORMED INDICATOR, to indicate whether a Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) Ultrasound Guided Fusion Biopsy (a process that creates a detailed, 360° prostate map) was performed on the PATIENT during a Urological Cancer Care Spell.
